title: Boku Mobile Payments
body:
Why is Telstra Mobile payments towards Riot points, been discontinued? 

Is their a way around it?

replies.body:
I'm not sure why it was discontinued, and there isn't a way around it (that would continue using mobile payments)[](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/jqLNv8P1-notice-starting-dec-13-telstra-customers-will-no-longer-be-able-to-use-mobile-payment-option). 
If you wish to buy RP you can continue to do so using prepaid RP cards (at supermarkets and game stores) or in the clients with a credit/debit card or with paypal.
